title: Beachfront Egypt Luxury with 21 Restaurants & Bars, Seven Pools & Private Beach
description:
Uncover the enchantment of Egyptâ€™s Red Sea Riviera with a luxurious stay at this sprawling five-star gem. Nearby the lively Naama Bay, Rixos Premium Seagate boasts private access to the crystal-clear waters of the Red Sea and seven shimmering pools for endless relaxation under the sun.

Savour global cuisine at 21 exceptional restaurants and bars, from lavish buffets at Veranda and Turkish delicacies at Lalezar to fresh seafood at Salt. Stay active with a modern fitness centre and wellbeing offerings, or unwind at the grand Rixos Anjana Spa, where indulgent treatments promise complete rejuvenation.
offer_address: South Sinai, Nabq Bay, Sharm El Sheikh 46628, Egypt
